segments.text: How long will it take us to drive to London ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think it ’ s a distance of 180 kilometers from here to London , so it should be a two-hour drive on the motorway .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s unless there is a traffic jam . It could take three hours .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ re right . We will be able to travel at high speeds at the beginning and end of the journey , because we will be in built-up area .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , shall we allow three hours to cover the distance ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . You haven ’ t seen my company car , have you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . let me take a look ... It ’ s longer than my car .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think it ’ s over five meters long . I can ’ t remember exactly . It has a maximum speed of over 200 kilometers an hour .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow ! That ’ s fast ! I don ’ t think we will be traveling that fast on the motorway .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can ’ t . if we went that fast , we would break the speed limit .
segments.speaker: S2
